thread.title: Rahul Gandhi tweets his picture at a conference in US
thread.title_full: Rahul Gandhi tweets his picture at a conference in US | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Rahul Gandhi tweets his picture at a conference in US
text:
Other Articles Delhi Court sends Somnath Bharti to two-day police custody Earthquake of 4.8 magnitude hits Uttarakhand's Pithoragarh Barack Obama's gaffe: calls PM Narendra Modi 'President' Amid speculation by the Bharatiya Janata Party ( BJP ) about his whereabouts, Congress Vice President Rahul Gandhi today tweeted a picture of his attending the Aspen conference in the US.
The tweet in Rahul Gandhi’s official Twitter handle @OfficeOfRG read, “Very interesting discussions on the global economy & the disruptive power of tech at the conference in Aspen.”
Congress leader Milind Deora also tweeted pictures of himself and Rahul with Iceland’s President Olafur Ragnar Grimsson and Rahul’s with former UK Foreign Secretary David Miliband attending International Affairs Conference.
Congress has been insisting that Rahul Gandhi has gone to the US to attend a conference, ‘Weekend with Charlie Rose’ at Aspen Institute in Colorado where eminent personalites from different walks of life like politics, finance, technology, media, medicine, sports gather to deliberate on multiple issues.
BJP has said that ‘Weekend With Charlie Rose’ was held between June 25 and July 4 claiming that Congress was “resorting to falsehood”.
 29, 2015 8:44 am
